method: 1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2. In a bowl, mix together the paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper.
3. Pat dry the chicken wings and toss them in the spice mixture until well coated.
4. Place the coated chicken wings on the prepared baking sheet.
5. Bake for 40-45 minutes or until the chicken wings are cooked through and crispy.
6. Remove the chicken wings from the oven and brush them with barbecue sauce.
7. Return the chicken wings to the oven for an additional 5 minutes to allow the barbecue sauce to caramelize.
8. Serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce and enjoy!
